turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Please do not apologize for every question. Sometimes you have to say no.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it — I’ll keep things natural and confident, not over-apologizing. Would you like to start a roleplay scenario now?

turns.text: you are a real estate agen

turns.text: Sure! Are you looking to rent or buy a property?

turns.text: Absolutely! We do have some properties available for expansion. Could you let me know what type of property you’re interested in and what kind of expansion you have in mind?

turns.text: Ah, I see what you mean! Thanks for clarifying. In that case, can you let me know the exact address or any more details about the house you saw, so I can give you the right info?

turns.text: “there is just one in Geroge street.”

turns.text: No worries at all! We can definitely explore some options. Would you like to share any preferences about the type of neighborhood or the features you’re looking for in the house?

turns.text: Absolutely! The house on George Street is a charming, recently renovated property with a modern kitchen and spacious living areas. It also has a cozy bedroom and some extra storage space. If there's anything specific you’d like to know, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “And how much for a week?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, you have a property in JavaScript that you don't know how it's big and how it's cost.”

turns.text: I understand, and I appreciate your patience. If you have any specific questions or details you can share, I’ll do my best to help. Otherwise, I'm happy to assist in any other way you need.

turns.text: “Oh, sorry, but I decided to move to another company because you cannot talk to me about your house, so I cannot understand if you are good or not, and I don't want to stay here for nothing. Sorry, but you have to discover more things about your house and about your job.”
